definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.chinese: 他是我的唯一的男中音。

sentences.english: Abrupt, a kind of simple and honest baritone waves to me.
sentences.chinese: 忽然，一种浑厚的男中音向我飘来。

sentences.english: Brass baritone by Adolphe Sax, Paris ca.
sentences.chinese: 黄铜由萨克斯男中音，巴黎的CA。

sentences.english: Yang Xiao-yong is a national-level actor and one of China's most outstanding baritones.
sentences.chinese: 国家一级演员，中国最优秀的男中音之一。

sentences.english: Every morning I can hear a rich voice of the baritone.
sentences.chinese: 每天早晨，我都能听到男中音浑厚的声音。
他是个优秀的男中音歌手。

sentences.english: Black lacquer baritone by by Selmer, Paris ca.
sentences.chinese: 黑漆的塞尔默的男中音，巴黎的CA。

definition: (of singing or speaking) very articulate pronunciation and vocalizing
high-pitched and penetrating (musical instrument, voice etc)/high-spirited/fever-pitched (atmosphere)
singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet
